title: Microchipper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: You can visit two players a night. This will give them Invincible defense. If you have targeted three people with this ability while they have been attacked, all of them get hit with a modkill.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have your ability trigger and attack people.

desc:
Post 4266
*Trust me, I know what I'm doing.*
